title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.2 - The depository trust company
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.2 - The depository trust company

State Regulations

Any bank or trust company is permitted to invest in or hold
shares of common stock of Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation, the
principal function of which is to serve as the holding company for The

Depository Trust Company and the National Securities Clearing

Corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
31.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
